title_translation.en: Bangladesh Has the Highest Pollution-Related Deaths in the World
title_translation.es: Bangladesh tiene las muertes m√°s altas relacionadas con la contaminaci√≥n en el mundo

content_translation.en: Pollution has a serious **adverse impact** on public health and causes worldwide **devastating consequences**. The greatest impact **emerges** from air pollution, which is the leading cause of pollution-related deaths. Air pollution, which is extremely **hazardous**, **triggers** premature death of approximately 6.5 million people every year. This includes **toxic gases**, fine particles in the air, and smoke from burning indoor fuels. Water pollution is the second largest **risk factor**, resulting in the death of 1.8 million people. Workplace pollution is also a significant challenge, which **claims** 800,000 lives. Pollution has the most impact in poor and rapidly **developing regions**. It **creates** not only environmental barriers but also significant obstacles to economic development. According to experts, **innovative strategies**, **sustainable practices**, and international **collaboration** are extremely important to solve this pollution crisis. The lack of proper **implementation** of pollution control makes this problem more complex. Bangladesh has the highest pollution-related deaths in the world.
content_translation.es: La contaminaci√≥n tiene un grave **adverse impact** en la salud p√∫blica y causa **devastating consequences** a nivel mundial. El mayor impacto **emerges** de la contaminaci√≥n del aire, que es la causa principal de muertes relacionadas con la contaminaci√≥n. La contaminaci√≥n del aire, que es extremadamente **hazardous**, **triggers** la muerte prematura de aproximadamente 6.5 millones de personas cada a√±o. Esto incluye **toxic gases**, part√≠culas finas en el aire y humo de la quema de combustibles en interiores. La contaminaci√≥n del agua es el segundo **risk factor** m√°s grande, resultando en la muerte de 1.8 millones de personas. La contaminaci√≥n en el lugar de trabajo tambi√©n es un desaf√≠o significativo, que **claims** 800,000 vidas. La contaminaci√≥n tiene el mayor impacto en regiones pobres y **developing regions** que se desarrollan r√°pidamente. **Creates** no solo barreras ambientales sino tambi√©n obst√°culos significativos para el desarrollo econ√≥mico. Seg√∫n los expertos, las **innovative strategies**, **sustainable practices** y la **collaboration** internacional son extremadamente importantes para resolver esta crisis de contaminaci√≥n. La falta de **implementation** adecuada del control de la contaminaci√≥n hace que este problema sea m√°s complejo. Bangladesh tiene las muertes m√°s altas relacionadas con la contaminaci√≥n en el mundo.
